text: The 1920–21 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team represented Drexel Institute of Art, Science and Industry during the 1920–21 men's basketball season. The Blue and Gold, led by 1st year head coach William McAvoy, played their home games at Main Building. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style="background:#F8B800; color:#002663;"| Regular season |- *Note: All games, except the last 6, are listed out of order ==References== Category:Drexel Dragons men's basketball seasons Drexel Category:1920 in sports in Pennsylvania Category:1921 in sports in Pennsylvania
title: 1920–21 Drexel Blue and Gold men's basketball team
